intension: Create a Facebook cover image to announce a flower exhibition event.
globalcaption: The image features a large orange flower with a petal on top, prominently displayed in the center of the frame. The flower is surrounded by a white background, which highlights its vibrant color. The flower appears to be the main focus of the image, and it is quite large, covering a significant portion of the frame.
keywords: flowers, exhibition, floral, nature, illustration, spring, beautiful, yellow, orange, facebook, cover, fb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white background with a large orange flower in the center. The flower is surrounded by several smaller orange flowers, creating a beautiful and vibrant scene. The smaller flowers are scattered around the main orange flower, with some positioned to the left, right, and below it. The arrangement of the flowers gives the impression of a bouquet, making the image visually appealing and inviting
